attributes.action: Rethink the Government action to scrap the childcare voucher scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to petition the Prime Minister to rethink the government plans to scrap the employer supported childcare voucher scheme.

rejection.details:
There is already a petition on this topic. 
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/keepvouchers/
To read more about the government's position on this matter visit: 
http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21036
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
